name: Cloud Generator
description: I want to use random cloud shape generation using several custom lump shapes to achieve a pretty and unique cloud shape on a blue sky.

name: Structure de Quadrilatères - Vera Molnar V1
description: Ive copied Vera Molnars artwork which contains a grid of figures made up of differing amounts of squares in either orange or charcoal colour. The Squares get denser in the middle columns.

name: Structure de Quadrilatères - Vera Molnar V2
description: Ive added some adjustments to the generated artwork. Giving it a different vibe

name: Remake of Herbert W Franke - V1
description: I used the kaleidoscope example code as a base to copy a live generated version of an artwork

name: Remake of Herbert W Franke - V2
description: Made some adjustments to generate a dierent type of shape.

name: Random Noise Dots
description: Uses the random position of dots to determine pitch and volume every 12 frames.
